content: full video tutorial https //yarnsociety com/videos/crochet-along-full-video-tutorial-for-cecil-the-cat/ the pattern is written in u s crochet terms complete with clear instructions pictures and full tutorial video to help you along the way cecil the cat is crocheted in continuous spirals without joining the rounds i suggest using a stitch marker or different color yarn to keep track of each round cecil the cat is crocheted in worsted weight yarn and is approximately 4 5 inches tall be aware that size may vary depending on the yarn and hook size used gauge is not particularly important just be consistent with the gauge you are using and most importantly have fun
